sense.name: a position
sense.commentary: conclusion, determination - a position or opinion or judgement reached after consideration
sense.examples: A decision unfavorable to the opposition. His decision took the evidence into account. Satisfied with the panel's decision... Make a decision. That was a good decision.

sense.name: act of deciding
sense.commentary: DECISION[+event] conclusion, determination - the act of making up your mind about something
sense.examples: Decision on the policy took the panel almost all day. The burden of decision was his.

sense.name: decisiveness
sense.commentary: the trait of resoluteness as evidenced by firmness of character or purpose

sense.name: game outcome
sense.commentary: the outcome of a game or contest
sense.examples: The team dropped three decisions in a row.

sense.name: victory
sense.commentary: (boxing) a victory won on points when no knockout has occurred
sense.examples: He had little trouble in taking a unanimous decision over his opponent.
